trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Blairsville
There were no other sightings in Blairsville on or around February 12th 2009
Summary: Bright steady light in the sky.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from helen, ga to blairsville, ga over black moutain\zell miller parkway, now, i drive this mountain pass at least 4 times a week at night, once i reached an elevation of about 2800' and cleared the trees i noticed something quite out of place, this object was definetly not a plane, it wasnt moving. definetly not a star, as the circumfrence was too large, but you could still tell the object was at some distance off...it was just, this bright, spherical\star type object just sitting stationary to the wsw of my position. i pulled over at the peak of the moutain (3500') to get a better view, i obserbed the object for roughly 5 minutes. in that time frame the object seemed to move ever so slightly to the south. whatever it was, it was quite massive. i guestimated the altitude to be about 14-18k ft. just continued on home after the 5 minutes, too cold at that elevation. and unfortunately did not have a camera in that vehicle.
